snippet.title: Roses Of Love Presentation of characters (PV1)
snippet.description:
"Congratulations on entering the prestigious Aoi Ladies Academy."

Akane is a country girl who dreams of studying at the prestigious Aoi Ladies Academy; there Akane will meet Hoshiko a girl born into a wealthy family, Eri a young aspiring pastry chef and Chizuru, who dreams of being the best swimmer in all of Japan. Akane will enjoy her school life and get to know the feelings of each of them. Little by little Akane will begin to realize something that may change her relationship with her friends. And this is "love?" find out in this story full of Romance and Comedy.


Info:
Character sprites, Music, BG, are temporary, and will be updated after their official release.


Web: https://rol.kagarisoft.com/

itch: https://kagarisoft.itch.io/roses-of-love

Credits

Temporal backgrounds: 

NoranekoGames : https://noranekogames.itch.io/

 Selavi Games: https://selavi.itch.io/

Temporal Sprites: 

NoranekoGames : https://noranekogames.itch.io/


Temporal Music: 

Souichi Sakagami(Trial & Error) : https://tandess.itch.io/

 Kevin MacLeod: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/




Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

The content of this game is fiction, any resemblance to reality is coincidental.
